main event: Military pilots reported seeing a long red streak shooting upward during an observation of the aurora borealis.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes,The streak was described as being 48 feet long and red in color,Two pilots confirmed the sighting,The observation took place on a clear night with a bright aurora borealis,The report concludes that much of the observations were either astronomical phenomena or unknown.
sighted object: a long red streak shooting upward
witness description: military pilots from the 169th Fighter Interceptor Squadron and the 179th Fighter Interceptor Squadron.
